> <OLD - Straight Shot>
>
> Straight Shot nods.
>
> " You're right, but lemme take the blame for it.  After all, it's
> something I usually am famous for."

> <OLD - Talon>
>
> "I'm guilty too"said the femme"But it isnt time for that, we must find
> Nightlight"

<NEW>

"Talon is right." LEO PRIME said, "Now is not the time for assigning
blame. For now we need to lock down the situation and sww what we can
salvage." There was somehting more than anger in LEO's voice, it was
concern. "From the reports I have read too many people have
disappeared since we have arrived here. Let's see if we can find some
of them."

They quickly enough find themselves on the bridge. LEGACY is already
there sitting at one of the consoles while LORD ELDER and TORCA
quickly follow behind TALON and STRAIGHT SHOT as they enter.

"Legacy." LEO PRIME said as he turned to look at him. "Activate the
sensor logs for the past hour and give me a visual diplay of
Nightlight's energy signature."

There was a nod from LEGACY as the turned to complete the task.

On the main viewscreen an image of the ARK and the surrounding section
is displayed. A dot representing NIGHTLIGHT's signature is shown to be
inside the ark, and then flying out of it, and travelling some
distance. Her signature landing nearly 100 miles away in a loney
isolated area.

"What is Nightlight doing out there?" LORD ELDER said, obviously not
aware of what has been happening.

TORCA looked similarly confused.

LEO held up his hand, "Just a moment." He said as he looked at LEGACY,
"Speed us up until we come to the present or until something happens.

LEGACY nodded and the scene sped up and then slowed down again as
something like RODIMUS PRIME showed up on the screen, or atleast an
energy signature that looked much like his.

On the screen the small dot that represented RODIMUS approached the
dot that represented NIGHTLIGHT. They interacted for a moment and then
they both vanished.

"A teleoprtation device?" TORCA said as he looked at the screen.

LEGACY peered at his console. "Perhaps." he siad in his typical cold
voice. "The signature at their disappearance resembled a space bridge
signature but on a much smaller scale and there were differences in it
as well."

TORCA grunted, "And that was probrably that Dark Rodimus again."

LEO PRIME nodded to TORCA and then looked around the room.
"Suggestions on how to find Nightlight now?"

(TAG)

Preston
